89cf711f-f9f5-4b5d-8df4-454bd0eb1fb7.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

8a38fc99-80a4-4c19-87a1-22bbf30d37f5.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

dbf28d57-f51a-4d1b-9ab1-15bbd0b2a392.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

885d69d6-5deb-4205-85b9-7ae35c71fa2b.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

e9575e10-f5cf-447d-8c54-6cdfc529ed54.name: Frequency: Constantly
e9575e10-f5cf-447d-8c54-6cdfc529ed54.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

25de581c-b8ee-46f9-aa15-5543120f13ef.name: Frequency: Hourly
25de581c-b8ee-46f9-aa15-5543120f13ef.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

8476f292-6f0d-449a-9b4f-9584918ec8da.name: Frequency: Daily
8476f292-6f0d-449a-9b4f-9584918ec8da.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

a6df849d-269c-4707-a09f-ebb74ab40479.name: Frequency: Weekly
a6df849d-269c-4707-a09f-ebb74ab40479.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

e6cb11de-0a2b-45dc-be42-e7cb5742e410.name: Frequency: Monthly
e6cb11de-0a2b-45dc-be42-e7cb5742e410.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

0dbef4fb-ceca-4164-ac86-a851d0fc43e2.name: Frequency: Seasonally
0dbef4fb-ceca-4164-ac86-a851d0fc43e2.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

c8dfa9fc-384f-45e8-b36d-3d1c7ccd9345.name: Frequency: Yearly
c8dfa9fc-384f-45e8-b36d-3d1c7ccd9345.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

1454183d-acee-4c2f-9d27-e06da37072fd.name: Aging
1454183d-acee-4c2f-9d27-e06da37072fd.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency
